page.title: 17GETTING READY FOR SCHOOL
page.content: I usually wake up at about 7 a.m. I wash, dress, then go downstairs and have my breakfast which consists of cereals and a cup of coffee. I then go upstairs and brush my teeth in the bathroom, after which I go and wake my mum and dad and my brother and sister in their separate rooms. I usually watch television between 7:45 and 8:20 a.m. then at 8:25 a.m. I get ready for school and leave home at 8:35 a.m. I arrive there, after walking, at roughly 8:45 a.m. after stopping at the shop to buy some crisps. I immediately go and find my two best friends; there is sometimes a game of tag going on first thing in the morning and almost everyone in the junior part of the school joins in. The bell for the beginning of school is rung at 9 a.m. by one of the oldest children whose turn it is to do it.
